name: Silence of Nobodies 08: Fear and Courage
description:
Postercomic N° 7: Fear and Courage.
A reflection on the shore of the sea of existence.

Postercomics tell stories about a mythological cosmogony, stories where we observe the creation of an universe and the different transcendental entities that inhabit it, these entities are always opposing dualities that represent different archetypes such as fear and courage, and dramatize a series of events in which the different qualities of these archetypes are reflected, proposing a teaching or reflection that motivates us to think about them and the role they play in our own lives. Each Poster-comic presents a different and auto conclusive story, although at the same time these stories cross their paths and are connected to each other.

Handmade drawing, digital color.
2500x3536 pixels
